caption.title: Hazard ratios (HRs) and corresponding 95% confidence intervals (95% CIs) of the association between taller body height at entry to adulthood and dementia diagnoses among the total population of men.

tr.th: HR (95% CI) for onset of dementia per one z-score* higher

fn.p: *Identify cohort-specific values of one z-score in Supplementary file 2.
†Model 1: Stratified by birthcohort and conscript board district. Age included as underlying scale of the model.
§Model 2b: Model 1 + adjusted for intelligence test scores.
¶Model 3: Model 1 + adjusted for educational level and intelligence test scores.
